msg: make framed transport the default so malformed requests can't OOM the server.  patch by Nate McCall; reviewed by jbellis for CASSANDRA-475

author: yonik
msg: SANDBOX-313: Endless loops in CSV parser when last line is comment

author: kmalhi
msg: Added support to write the Validation report to confluence directly. To generate this report run the following maven command:
mvn test -Dtest=ValidationKeysAuditorTest -DconfluenceUsername=<<your confluence username>> -DconfluencePassword=<<your confluence password>>
If you do not supply the above system properties, then nothing will be written to confluence.
